data.comment: The match has started at Vitality Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at Vitality Stadium.
In the minute 46, Stephen Martin has blown to start the second-half.
Bournemouth make their first substitution with Arnaut Danjuma replacing Junior Stanislas.
Dean Holden is making the team's first substitution at Vitality Stadium with Chris Brunt replacing Antoine Semenyo.
In the minute 81, Arnaut Danjuma puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a second substitution, with Chris Martin replacing Famara Diedhiou.
Nahki Wells is replacing Jack Hunt for the away team.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
